description: Observations to Hackney Council for conversion of existing 4-storey over basement building and addition of nine floors to create 13 storey over basement building comprising 1200 sq.m. B1 (Business) floor space at lower and upper ground floors and 98 affordable housing units (27 one-bed units, 53 two-bed units and 18 three- bed units) above.
decision_conditions: This Council considers that the increase in scale of development of the existing building from four to thirteen storeys would be a gross over development of the site, would be harmful to the setting of Rosemary Gardens, and would be clearly visible from and harmful to the character and appearance of both the East Canonbury Conservation Area and the Arlington Square Conservation Area.
